LightningComponentBundle.masterLabel: Calendar Event Details for Experience Cloud
LightningComponentBundle.description: Calendar Event Details for Experience Cloud

property.name: eventDetailButtonText
property.label: Event Detail Button Text
property.description: Text for the event detail button, defaults to 'More Info'.

property.name: buttonsOnBottom
property.label: Display Buttons at the Bottom
property.description: Check to display the buttons at the bottom instead of above the content.

property.name: truncate
property.label: Truncate Event Title and Body
property.description: Check to truncate event title and body (location and description).

property.name: truncateEachLine
property.label: Truncate Each Line Separately in Event Description
property.description: Check to truncate each line separately within the event Description.

property.name: truncateNumberOfLinesToDisplay
property.label: Number of Lines Shown Before Truncation
property.description: Specify the number of lines to display before truncation. Only takes effect when Truncate Each Line Separately in Event Description is false.
